properties.static_value: B u g

formElement.name: submitted_by
formElement.label: Submitted by
formElement.description: User who originally submitted the artifact

formElement.name: last_update_date
formElement.label: Last Modified On
formElement.description: Date and time of the latest modification in an artifact

formElement.name: open_date
formElement.label: Submitted on
formElement.description: Date and time for the initial artifact submission

formElement.name: summary
formElement.label: Headline
formElement.description: One line description of the artifact

formElement.name: details
formElement.label: Description
formElement.description: A full description of the artifact

formElement.name: multi_assigned_to
formElement.label: Assigned to (multiple)
formElement.description: Who is in charge of this artifact

formElement.name: severity
formElement.label: Severity
formElement.description: Impact of the artifact on the system (Critical, Major,...)

formElement.name: stage
formElement.label: Stage
formElement.description: Stage in the life cycle of the artifact

item.label: New
item.description: The artifact has just been submitted

item.label: Analyzed
item.description: The cause of the artifact has been identified and documented

item.label: Accepted
item.description: The artifact will be worked on.

item.label: Under Implementation
item.description: The artifact is being worked on.

item.label: Ready for Review
item.description: Updated/Created non-software work product (e.g. documentation) is ready for review and approval.

item.label: Ready for Test
item.description: Updated/Created software is ready to be included in the next build

item.label: In Test
item.description: Updated/Created software is in the build and is ready to enter the test phase

item.label: Approved
item.description: The artifact fix has been succesfully tested. It is approved and awaiting release.

item.label: Declined
item.description: The artifact was not accepted.

item.label: Done
item.description: The artifact is closed.

formElement.name: resolution
formElement.label: Resolution
formElement.description: The resolution field indicates what happened to the bug.

formElement.name: assigned_to
formElement.label: Assigned to
formElement.description: Who is in charge of solving the artifact

formElement.name: cross_references
formElement.label: Cross references
formElement.description: List of items referenced by or referencing this item.

formElement.name: permissions_on_artifact
formElement.label: Permissions on artifact
formElement.description: Let users groups to define who can access an artifact.

formElement.name: stage_1
formElement.label: Stage
formElement.description: Stage in the life cycle of the artifact

item.label: Sprint Backlog
item.description: Sprint Backlog

formElement.name: stage
formElement.label: Stage
formElement.description: Stage in the life cycle of the artifact

item.label: New
item.description: The artifact has just been submitted

item.label: Analyzed
item.description: The cause of the artifact has been identified and documented

item.label: Accepted
item.description: The artifact will be worked on.

item.label: Under Implementation
item.description: The artifact is being worked on.

item.label: Ready for Review
item.description: Updated/Created non-software work product (e.g. documentation) is ready for review and approval.

item.label: Ready for Test
item.description: Updated/Created software is ready to be included in the next build

item.label: In Test
item.description: Updated/Created software is in the build and is ready to enter the test phase

item.label: Approved
item.description: The artifact fix has been succesfully tested. It is approved and awaiting release.

item.label: Deployed
item.description: Artifact in production

item.label: Declined
item.description: The artifact was not accepted.

formElement.name: rank
formElement.label: Rank
formElement.description: Rank of story in current sprint (i.e priority)

formElement.name: product
formElement.label: Product
formElement.description: Product impacted by story (for multi-product project)

formElement.name: customer
formElement.label: Customer
formElement.description: Customer(s) that requested this story (for multi-customer projects)

formElement.name: acceptance_criteria
formElement.label: Acceptance criteria
formElement.description: Description of customer acceptance criteria for this story

formElement.name: rank
formElement.label: Rank
formElement.description: Rank of story in current sprint (i.e priority)

item.description: Product Backlog

semantic.label: Title
semantic.description: Define the title of an artifact
